taskbody.context: In this section of the lab you will create a snapshot of your volume. The snapshot will capture the volume “as is”, which means that snapshot will capture your partition information, file system, as well as the file that you wrote to the file system.

step.cmd: From the front-end host, view the available volumes.
Create a snapshot of the volume.

Use euca-describe-snapshots to check the creation progress of your new snapshot. Note the percentage of progress reported each time you run the command. Wait for a status of completed. This operation can take a minute or two.
